check_lid_functionality.description: Examine the USB lid operation by pressing it.

wipe_surface_of_lid.description: Clean the lid with a wipe to remove dust and dirt.

confirm_lid_operation.description: Press the lid to verify its operation, then release.

lid_normal_maintenance.description: Wipe down the lid of the USB to remove dust and grime.

check_and_clean_lid.description: Verify the lid functionality then clean it as necessary.

clean_n_press_lid.description: Perform a cleaning session of the lid then press it to validate its operation.

lid_maintenance.description: Wipe down the USB lid to ensure its cleanliness and unhindered sliding.

verify_lid_functionality.description: Press the USB lid slightly to validate its functionality.

inspect_lid.description: Press the USB lid to examine its functionality.

clean_lid_surface.description: Swipe over the lid to remove dust, dirt etc.

check_operation_lid.description: Press and release the lid to ensure its operation.

cleaning_lid.description: Wipe off dust and grime from the lid of the USB.

inspect_and_clean_lid.description: Check the functionality of the lid, and clean if necessary.

press_clean_lid.description: Press the lid to verify its seamless operation, followed by a thorough cleaning.

clean_lid.description: Wipe the lid of the USB to remove dust and ensure smooth sliding.

press_lid.description: Press the lid of the USB slightly to ensure its functioning.

wiping_usb_body.description: Wipe down the USB body to maintain its cleanliness.

usb_body_inspections.description: Inspect the USB body for possible damage or dust.

usb_body_maintenance.description: Perform maintenance cleaning of the USB body.

cleanse_usb_body.description: Ensure the USB body is clean and free of dust.

clean_body.description: Wipe off the USB body to maintain its cleanliness.

inspection_usb_body.description: Examine the usb body, look for any potential damage or dust.

clean_usb_body.description: Wipe off the body of the USB to keep it clean and free of dust.

wipe_usb_body.description: Wipe across the USB body, ensuring it's clean and dust-free.

usb_diagnostic_check.description: Perform a regular checkup of the USB, press the lid and wipe clean both the lid and body.

thorough_usb_wipe_down.description: Perform a complete clean-up of the USB, wiping lid and body clean.

usb_deep_cleaning.description: Full clean-up of the USB, beginning with the lid and then the body.

test_and_clean_usb.description: Operational check of the USB lid followed by a complete clean-up.

maintenance_and_cleaning.description: Check USB lid for dirt, press it and clean the whole USB.

lid_action_and_clean_up.description: Clean the lid first then press it to check its functionality.

usb_full_cleanup.description: Perform a full clean-up of the USB, removing debris from lid and body.

full_usb_cleaning.description: Complete cleaning of the USB, lid and body included.

lid_operation_and_cleanup.description: Press the USB lid then clean it to confirm a smooth operation.

routine_check.description: Regular maintenance checkup for USB, press the lid to check functionality and then cleanup of lid and body

clean_all_usb_surface.description: Complete cleaning of the USB, wipes dust off of both the lid and the body.

thorough_usb_cleaning.description: Complete cleaning of the USB, starting with the lid and then cleaning the body.

operational_check_and_clean.description: Press the USB lid to check its operation and then clean the entire USB.

inspect_and_clean.description: Inspect for any grime on the USB lid, press the lid and clean the entire USB.

clean_and_press_lid.description: Initiate with cleaning the lid and then press it to verify its functionality.

overall_usb_cleaning.description: Clean the complete USB, removing any debris from the lid and body.

clean_whole_usb.description: Clean the entire USB including the lid and body.

press_then_clean_lid.description: Press the lid of the USB, then clean it to ensure smooth functioning.
